name: Technical Support
description: Template for technical support and troubleshooting cases

workflow: 1. Create case with title, severity, and product information
2. Gather technical details: version, environment, error codes
3. Document reproduction steps and expected vs actual behavior
4. Investigate and update status as work progresses
5. Document workarounds if available during investigation
6. Record final resolution and close case
bestPractices: Set severity based on business impact, not technical complexity
Always capture error codes and messages when available
Document clear reproduction steps for faster resolution
Update status regularly to keep stakeholders informed

title.example: API timeout errors in production environment

error_message.example: Connection timeout after 30 seconds when calling external API

steps_to_reproduce.example:
1. Login to application
2. Navigate to reports section
3. Click 'Generate Report'
4. Error occurs after 30 seconds

expected_behavior.example: Report should generate within 10 seconds and display results

actual_behavior.example: Application shows timeout error and no report is generated

workaround.example: Use smaller date ranges or export data in batches

resolution.example: Increased API timeout from 30s to 60s and optimized database query
